<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3354</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3354</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">El cibercançoner</string>
            <string language="en">Cybersongbook</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Cybersongbook</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cybersongbook</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cybersongbook</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cybersongbook</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Cybersongbook</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Recull de cançons infantils, cadascuna amb una làmina amb la il·lustració de la cançó, la lletra,  la partitura i una opció per escoltar-ne la melodia. Es poden descarregar totes les làmines en un sol arxiu pdf, així com totes les melodies en format midi.</string>
            <string language="en">Collection of young children's songs, each one with a pdf page with an illustration of the song, the lyrics, the music score and the possibility of listening to the melody. The pdf's can be downloaded as one file, as can the melodies in midi format.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">escoltar música</string>
            <string language="en">listening to music</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">música</string>
            <string language="en">music</string>
            <string language="es">música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">cançó infantil</string>
            <string language="en">nursery rhyme</string>
            <string language="es">canción infantil</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ansammlung Liede der jungen Kinder, jede mit 
einer pdf Seite mit einer Abbildung des Lieds, die Lyriken, die
Musikkerbe und die Möglichkeit des Hörens zur Melodie. Die pdf
können als eine Datei downloadet werden, wie die Melodien im Midi 
Format können.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Collection des chansons des enfants en bas âge, 
chacune avec une page de pdf avec une illustration de la chanson, le 
lyrique, les points de musique et la possibilité d'écouter la 
mélodie. Les pdf peuvent être téléchargés en tant qu'un 
fichier, de même que peuvent les mélodies dans le format du Midi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Coleção de canções de crianças novas, cada 
com uma página do pdf com uma ilustração da canção, os lyrics, a 
contagem da música e a possibilidade de escutar a melodia. Os 
pdf podem downloaded como uma lima, como podem as melodias no formato 
de midi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Accumulazione delle canzoni dei bambini in 
giovane età, ogni con una pagina del pdf con un'illustrazione della 
canzone, i lyrics, il segno di musica e la possibilità di ascoltare 
la melodia. I pdf possono essere trasferiti come un archivio, 
come possono le melodie nel formato del Midi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συλλογή των τραγουδιών των μικρών παιδιών, καθεμία με
μια σελίδα pdf με μια απεικόνιση του τραγουδιού, των λυρικών 
ποιημάτων, του αποτελέσματος μουσικής και της δυνατότητας τη 
μελωδία. Τα pdf μπορούν να μεταφορτωθούν ως ένα αρχείο, 
όπως μπορούν οι μελωδίες με τη μορφή του Midi.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hören Musik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Baumschule Reim</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">écouter la musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">comptine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">escutar a música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">rima de berçário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ascoltando la musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">rima di scuola materna</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">άκουσμα τη μουσική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μουσική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">έμμετρος λόγος βρεφικών σταθμών</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
